alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 3:00AM PST until January 21 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southern Nevada and southeast California. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Crosswinds could result in over-turned high-profile vehicles on major thoroughfares. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest wind speeds will be focused in the higher terrain. Dangerous crosswinds possible along Interstate 15 between Barstow-Daggett and Primm as well as along Interstate 40 between Barstow-Daggett and Needles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
